description: Details required by Condition 3 (submission of details - b) notwithstanding the approved drawings, elevation (1:10) and section (1:5) drawings of new doors, architraves and pediments with details of mouldings in section (1:1) and a plan showing locations of retained / historic doors and new doors. New doors shall be made of solid timber and hand painted) of planning permission LB/23/04620 (Refurbishment of existing town house comprising of internal alterations and external alterations including: revisions to plan form; replacement of modern decorative features, internal alterations to main hallway staircase; reinstatement of rooflights in entertainment lounge; reinstatement of lightwell staircase; and changes to west elevation including new roof terrace door and brick attic staircase enclosure)
site_name: Stuart House, 84 Cadogan Square, LONDON, SW1X 0DZ
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
